articles.title: The forging of a Black Captain America by battling supremacy in "Falcon and the Winter Soldier" - Salon
articles.description: To take up Cap's shield in a country built on white supremacy requires more than a stellar workout montage

articles.title: Citi's exit from consumer banking is 'no surprise' - The Star Online
articles.description: NEWS that American banking group Citigroup Inc is closing down its consumer banking business in 13 markets, including Malaysia, does not come as a surprise and has ignited fresh concerns that competition in the banking space can only get more heated.

articles.title: Covid UK: Pregnant women should get Pfizer or Moderna vaccines, government advisors say - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Joint Committee on Vaccination and Immunisation (JCVI) said real-world data from the rollout in the US had shown the two American jabs were safe in expectant mothers.
